head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MARSHALL, THOMAS J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MARSHALL, THOMAS J.

block.p: MARSHALL-Thomas J. On July 10, 2000 of Rockville Centre, N.Y. Beloved husband of the late Frances. Dear father of Thomas L. Marshall, Agnes Mulhern, Frances Cunningham, Joan Genovese and Rita Mazzeo. Cherished grandfather of twenty three, great grandfather of twenty two and great, great grandfather of two. Reposing at Macken Mortuary, Inc., 52 Clinton Avenue, Rockville Centre, N.Y. Wednesday 2-4, 7-9 pm. Funeral mass Thursday 10 am St. Agnes Cathedral, Rockville Centre. Interment Resurrection Cemetery, Farmingdale, N.Y.
